CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__LineType__c , 'Option')), Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryLine__c = TRUE,OR(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name ="eParcel Express",Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name ="International Bundle", Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name ="eParcel",Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name ="International Digital PCMS Bundle",Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name ="International Digital PCMS Bundle incl Airmail Letters")), HYPERLINK("/apex/c__APT_GetRenewalRates?selectedRecordID="&Id&"&autoSync=true",IMAGE("/resource/APT_EnterRKCode_Cart", "Get P&Y Rate Card"),"_self"),null)
CustomField.label: P&Y Rates
